Name: Lux
Text: Congratulations. You've reached a checkpoint, anytime you are critically injured you are able to recall back to this checkpoint. Just ran past them to active them. Only one can be active at a time.

Name: Lux
Text: Stop touching your wound. Don't worry I'm not that evil. Up ahead is a medkit I laid. Collect them to heal yourself. They are onetime use however so be smart.
